TopicTitle: Ask a stupid question, Get a stupid answer back.

Articles.Content:
in my cup

whose on ustream right now chit chating , i mean it is what is ; ) ?

upiranhas are on ustream

what do you bring to space toweltoweltoweltoweltoweltoweltoweltoweltoweltoweltoweltoweltoweltoweltoweltoweltoweltoweltoweltoweltoweltoweltoweltoweltoweltoweltoweltoweltoweltowel

Something you can wrap around you for warmth as you bound across the cold moons of Jaglan Beta;

something you can lie on, on the brilliant marble-sanded beaches of Santraginus V;

something you can sleep under beneath the stars which shine so redly on the desert world of Kakrafoon;

something you can use to sail a miniraft down the slow heavy River Moth;

something you can wet for use in hand-to-hand-combat;

something to wrap round your head to ward off noxious fumes or avoid the gaze of the Ravenous Bugblatter Beast of Traal;

something you can wave in emergencies as a distress signal,

and of course something you can dry yourself off with it if it still seems to be clean enough.

You didn't ask a question so I'm going to pretend this is Jeopardy for a round.

What is a large lasagna noodle?

A large lasagna noodle.

How do I press a button???????

Drop A feather on it.

Why Am I a Potato?

Because the sun has purple.

12=k?

i=NaN

HOW DOES ENGLISH

ENGLISH DOES GRAMMAR

How does the Earth keep rotating at the same speed?

By rotating at the same speed.

HOW DO I ____!?!?

reach top scores many time then go underscore ; )

Watched a scott manley video for the first time a few days ago, is that even possible ? xDr
